get.summary: Retrieve a list of valid categories (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip a number of categories

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned categories

default.description: Retrieve a list of valid categories

post.summary: Submit JSON data in bulk that will be forwarded to a Kafka topic based on its category (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: What category the records belong to

default.description: Submit JSON data in bulk that will be forwarded to a Kafka topic based on its category

post.summary: Submit JSON data that will be forwarded to a Kafka topic based on its category (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: What category the records belong to

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: The customer ID or shortname that this data belongs to. Defaults to the current users customer

parameters.name: ignoreOnFailed
parameters.description: Whether or not to ignore any errors in the record

default.description: Submit JSON data that will be forwarded to a Kafka topic based on its category

get.summary: Returns a json schema identified by type. (PUBLIC)

parameters.description: The shortName of the JsonObject type.

default.description: Returns a json schema identified by type.

get.summary: Search json objects with specified query parameters (PUBLIC)

parameters.description: Limit search to favorites

parameters.name: includeData
parameters.description: Whether or not to include the actual JsonObject data in the response.

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Whether or not to include deleted JsonObjects in the response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit result

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset result

default.description: Search json objects with specified query parameters

post.summary: Creates a new JsonObject of a specified type. (PUBLIC)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The shortName of the JsonObject type.

default.description: default response

get.summary: Returns a JsonObject identified by either id or type+shortname. (PUBLIC)

get.summary: Returns a list of access entries for a JsonObject identified by either id or type+shortname (PUBLIC)

parameters.description: By how many records to offset results

default.description: Returns a list of access entries for a JsonObject identified by either id or type+shortname

post.summary: Adds an access entry to the identified JsonObject. (PUBLIC)

parameters.description: Whether or not to include the actual JsonObject data in the revision responses.

parameters.description: By how many records to offset results

default.description: Returns the revisions of a JsonObject identified by either id or type+shortname

put.summary: Reverts a JsonObject identified by either id or type+shortname to a previous revision (PUBLIC)

items.description: The list of errors detected about the data

customer.description: The customer ID or shortname that this data belongs to. Defaults to the current users customer

records.description: The records containing the JSON data

schema.description: The json schema of a given type

domain.description: Domain that this customer belongs to.

customer.description: The customer the subject belongs to

items.description: The subject's flags

no.mnemonic.services.jsonobject.spi.resp.description: JsonObject response. Provides the JsonObject itself along with meta information

createdByUser.description: The user that created the JsonObject.

currentUserAccess.description: Which access the current user has for the current JsonObject

customer.description: Info about the customer owning the JsonObject.

deletedByUser.description: The user that deleted this JsonObject (if deleted).

deletedTimestamp.description: When this JsonObject was deleted (if deleted).

flags.description: Flags that are set on this JsonObject.

items.description: Flags that are set on this JsonObject.

id.description: An automatically created UUID to identify the object.

lastUpdatedByUser.description: The user that last updated the JsonObject.

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: When this JsonObject was last updated.

localizedDescription.description: The localized description for the current users language.

localizedName.description: The localized name for the current users language.

masterID.description: The UUID of the master JsonObject if this is a revision. Null if not.

revision.description: The change revision of the JsonObject.

type.description: The type that is implemented by this JsonObject.

id.description: An automatically created UUID to identify the tag.

shortName.description: A shortname representing one out of several defined JsonObject types.

customer.description: The customer the subject belongs to

items.description: The subject's flags

no.mnemonic.services.jsonobject.spi.resp.description: An access entry giving access to a JsonObject for a specific user, groups or functions

customer.description: Customer which is granted role based access. Null if global permission.

flags.description: Flags that are set on this access entry.

items.description: Flags that are set on this access entry.

function.description: Function which is granted role based access.

grantedByUser.description: The user that has granted this permission.

id.description: An automatically created UUID to identify the access entry.

level.description: The access level this entry grants.

revokedByUser.description: The user that revoked this permission.

type.description: The access type this entry grants.

no.mnemonic.services.jsonobject.spi.requ.description: Base request to add access entries to a JsonObject

customer.description: ID or shortname of customer for granting role-based access. Null if global permission.

function.description: ID or name of function for granting role-based access.

level.description: The access level this entry grants.

searchable.description: If true, the object will be searchable.

subject.description: ID or shortname for user or group to grant explicit access to.

no.mnemonic.services.jsonobject.spi.requ.description: Request for adding a bulk of access entries to a JsonObject

data.description: The actual JSON. Max 1MB string encoded JSON.

additionalProperties.description: Description in specified languages. Required for global objects.

localizedDescriptions.description: Description in specified languages. Required for global objects.

additionalProperties.description: Display name in specified languages. Required for global objects.

localizedNames.description: Display name in specified languages. Required for global objects.

shortName.description: If set, this needs to be unique per type. If not, this will default to the generated UUID of the object.

tags.description: Tags to set on this object.

key.description: Key for this tag. Must be alphanumeric (no spaces), and at most 256 characters

value.description: Value for this tag. Must be a string below 1024 characters

no.mnemonic.services.jsonobject.spi.requ.description: Request to add an access entry to a JsonObject

customer.description: ID or shortname of customer for granting role-based access. Null if global permission.

function.description: ID or name of function for granting role-based access.

level.description: The access level this entry grants.

searchable.description: If true, the object will be searchable.

subject.description: ID or shortname for user or group to grant explicit access to.

exclude.description: If true, exclude any objects matching this tag criteria

key.description: Key for tag to search for.

values.description: Values for tag to search for. Will match objects where tag matches key and any of these values. If no values are specified, will match all objects with a tag with this key.

items.description: Values for tag to search for. Will match objects where tag matches key and any of these values. If no values are specified, will match all objects with a tag with this key.

no.mnemonic.services.jsonobject.spi.requ.description: Request to search for json objects

customer.description: Limit search to json objects with the given customers, identified by id or shortname

items.description: Limit search to json objects with the given customers, identified by id or shortname

endTimestamp.description: Restrict to a time frame based on the set timeFieldStrategy (end timestamp)

excludeFlags.description: Filter out objects with any of these flags set

items.description: Filter out objects with any of these flags set

favorite.description: Whether to only search for favorites, exclude favorites or neither

includeData.description: Whether to include data in the response.

includeDeleted.description: Whether to include deleted json objects in the search. Only allowed for users with ´jsonObjectAdministration` permission

includeFlags.description: Filter by objects with all these flags set

items.description: Filter by objects with all these flags set

includeTags.description: Whether to include tags in the response.

keywordFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

keywordMatchStrategy.description: Defines how strict different keywords should be matched

keywords.description: Search for keywords against fields defined by KeywordFieldStrategy

items.description: Search for keywords against fields defined by KeywordFieldStrategy

sortBy.description: Specify the order of results. Prefix with '-' to order descending.

items.description: Specify the order of results. Prefix with '-' to order descending.

startTimestamp.description: Restrict to a time frame based on the set timeFieldStrategy (start timestamp)

tags.description: Search for objects matching these tags

timeFieldStrategy.description: Defines which timestamp fields will be filtered with start/endTimestamp

items.description: Defines which timestamp fields will be filtered with start/endTimestamp

timeMatchStrategy.description: Defines how strict to match against different timestamps (all/any) using start and end timestamp

user.description: Search using users identified by id or shortname. If given a group, we will resolve all members of the group recursively

items.description: Search using users identified by id or shortname. If given a group, we will resolve all members of the group recursively

userFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by user

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by user

no.mnemonic.services.jsonobject.spi.requ.description: Request defining if sub-criteria should be included or excluded

customer.description: Limit search to json objects with the given customers, identified by id or shortname

items.description: Limit search to json objects with the given customers, identified by id or shortname

endTimestamp.description: Restrict to a time frame based on the set timeFieldStrategy (end timestamp)

exclude.description: Exclude objects matching subcriteria? If true the search is NOT-ed

excludeFlags.description: Filter out objects with any of these flags set

items.description: Filter out objects with any of these flags set

favorite.description: Whether to only search for favorites, exclude favorites or neither

includeFlags.description: Filter by objects with all these flags set

items.description: Filter by objects with all these flags set

keywordFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

keywordMatchStrategy.description: Defines how strict different keywords should be matched

keywords.description: Search for keywords against fields defined by KeywordFieldStrategy

items.description: Search for keywords against fields defined by KeywordFieldStrategy

required.description: Is this subcriteria required? If true the search is AND-ed

startTimestamp.description: Restrict to a time frame based on the set timeFieldStrategy (start timestamp)

tags.description: Search for objects matching these tags

timeFieldStrategy.description: Defines which timestamp fields will be filtered with start/endTimestamp

items.description: Defines which timestamp fields will be filtered with start/endTimestamp

timeMatchStrategy.description: Defines how strict to match against different timestamps (all/any) using start and end timestamp

user.description: Search using users identified by id or shortname. If given a group, we will resolve all members of the group recursively

items.description: Search using users identified by id or shortname. If given a group, we will resolve all members of the group recursively

userFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by user

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by user

addTags.description: If set, add these tags to the object.

data.description: The actual JSON. Max 1MB string encoded JSON.

additionalProperties.description: Description in specified languages. Required for global objects.

localizedDescriptions.description: Description in specified languages. Required for global objects.

additionalProperties.description: Display name in specified languages. Required for global objects.

localizedNames.description: Display name in specified languages. Required for global objects.

removeTags.description: If set, remove these tags from the object, by tag ID or key. If key is specified, this will match all tags with this key.

items.description: If set, remove these tags from the object, by tag ID or key. If key is specified, this will match all tags with this key.

shortName.description: If set, this needs to be unique per type.

skipRevision.description: If true, do not create a new revision for this update.

key.description: Key for this tag. Must be alphanumeric (no spaces), and at most 256 characters

value.description: Value for this tag. Must be a string below 1024 characters

no.mnemonic.services.jsonobject.spi.resp.description: Describing the type and fields of a JsonObject.

shortName.description: A shortname representing one out of several defined JsonObject types.

blockedUri.description: The URI of the resource that was blocked from loading by the Content Security Policy.

documentUri.description: The URI of the document in which the violation occurred.

effectiveDirective.description: The directive whose enforcement caused the violation.

originalPolicy.description: The original policy as specified by the Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only HTTP header.

referrer.description: The referrer of the document in which the violation occurred.

scriptSample.description: The first 40 characters of the inline script, event handler, or style that caused the violation.

statusCode.description: The HTTP status code of the resource on which the global object was instantiated.

violatedDirective.description: The name of the policy section that was violated.

additionalProperties.description: Additional information that could be relevant in the context. Max length of context values is 4000 characters.

message.description: Event message. Max string length is 4000 characters.

stacktrace.description: Complete stacktrace for event. Max string length is 10000 characters.

timestamp.description: Timestamp for event. Accepts ISO-8601 timestamp string.

ignoreOnFailed.description: Set this value for successful response even with failures occur while submitting.

componentInstanceID.description: ID of the component instance that provides log

container.description: Name of the container that provides log
